en.title: Testing page for Lexicon
en.introduction: Introduction - This page is to show Lexicon-Ruby in action. This part is written in Ruby/ERB

JwtAuthenticatedDemo.title: JwtAuthenticatedDemo
JwtAuthenticatedDemo.description: This is the same Demo component, but it uses JWT headers to authenticate & save.

CorsTester.title: Cors Tester
CorsTester.description: To test CORS, point 'cors.test' in your /etc/hosts to this server. Than edit via the CorsTest ClientApp. You'll need to add the Github api token.  It's testing CORS because LexiconServer is at http://localhost, and the ClientApp is on http://cors.test
